commentBody:
Gorsuch has disqualified himself by participating in this disgusting partisan exercise tonight. What happened: two candidates summoned to the WH - is this American Idol style for SCOTUS?
SCOTUS is now truly degraded and the media are entirely complicit in this farce. Remember Germany 1933 - the WH, the Congress, and soon SCOTUS.

comments.commentBody: The United States is not Europe

I do not understand your comment. One of the many causes of the failure of the Weimar Republic was the conservative judiciary. The justice system was a holdover from the Wilhelmine Empire, which severely punished liiberals but gave conservatives and fascists basically a pass. Democracy was undermined from within.

Let me help you remember Germany: Major military defeat with a loss of 25% of male population, and thousands of uniformed thugs killing innocent people and destroying personal property.

The only people destroying private property today are protestors. Liberals need to find better rhetoric.
